title: FPS
body: Hello guys, so me and my wife are playing this game from season 4 if i remember good and never had experiened problems with our FPS , we are keeping our computers in shape.. i mailed about it they said to try cleaning the dust from storage or put fan cooler to max.. i keep it clean as first as second if i put it at max or boost it it may cause my craphic card to die lol.. so yea its not to us its to the game its not possible that in one day i have 120 fps locked and the next day i struggle at 30-40? Any possible fixes/solutions/advices? ( im sure my pc can run it as i said i used to play on 120 whole season 6 and start of season 7.. ) - I checked are the drivers up to date.. and few days ago i started playing other games like tf2, planetside2, infestation : newz.. theyr working perfectly fine thought newz is not good optimized but im getting more fps in those games then in league and they are more playable...

replies.body: Im done with sending you all the nessesary files about finding out why is it happening, i think minions on Summoner rift have to do something with it. Going to try reinstalling the game tonight if it helps ill keep playing it if it doesnt help ill wait for you guys to fix it. I tryed going trought whole the guide and find out is it to me, aswell tryed following multiply guides on youtube. Contacted your support & sent files that were needed about my game client. Its just not possible that im playing with 30 fps. And it is not playable like that. As i see on your forums a lot of people have similiar / same problem as mine. Regards

You did some good first steps to troubleshoot that fps by trying to update your drivers and such, so we can rule that out. This could be more centered around corrupted game files or your game could possibly be affected by programs running in the background. 

Let's go through the rest of the steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) and we should be able to get to the main cause of your frames dropping.
